question: You need to take leave from your work for almost a month for some personal reasons. Write a letter to your Manager. In your letter:• Explain the reason for your leave & the length of your leave.• Explain how you intend to deliver the task that was given to you recently and has to be turned in in a week’s time.• Explain how & who will look after your work while you are away. Write at least 150 words. You do NOT need to write any addresses.
text: I am writing with regard to ask for leave from my work which would be for a month.With respect to my father's health issue.

As per , the doctor's advice, he will undergo  an angiography, if any criticality occurs, he will have to go for  open heart surgery. As I am the only child in my family, I have to bear all expenses and will do all paperwork related to my father's health insurance. so I am planning to go to my hometown for them.

However, the task of cloud migration is almost completed only the knowledge transfer is remaining, which I will complete  this week.Other pipeline tasks like hypervisor hardware upgradation, will be handled by my counterpart Mr Mahfer, he will perform all steps to complete these tasks and I will help him remotely.
I am looking forward to your early response.
